mapper.update: update user u set u.commit = case when DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T') > DATE_FORMAT(u.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T') < DATE_FORMAT(u.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') then '进行中' when DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T') > DATE_FORMAT(u.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') then '已经结束' when DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T') < DATE_FORMAT(u.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') then '还未开始' end, u.aaa = case when DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T') > DATE_FORMAT(u.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T') < DATE_FORMAT(u.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') then '0' when DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T') > DATE_FORMAT(u.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') then '1' when DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T') < DATE_FORMAT(u.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') then '2' end
